00006 extern double gsl_shift_function(int,double,double,double,double,int,int);
00007 extern double gsl_shift_function_dE(int,double,double,double,double,int,int);

00018 class ShftFunc {
00019  public:
00023   ShftFunc(PPair* pPair) {
00024     z1_=pPair->GetZ(1);
00025     z2_=pPair->GetZ(2);
00026     redmass_=(double) pPair->GetRedMass();
00027     totalSepE_=pPair->GetSepE()+pPair->GetExE();
00028     radius_=(double) pPair->GetChRad();
00029   };
00033   int z1() const {return z1_;};
00037   int z2() const {return z2_;};
00041   double redmass() const {return redmass_;};
00045   double totalSepE() const {return totalSepE_;};
00049   double radius() const {return radius_;};
00055   double operator()(int l,double energy) const {
00056     return gsl_shift_function(l,energy,totalSepE(),radius(),redmass(),
00057                               z1(),z2());
00058   };
00063   double EnergyDerivative(int l,double energy) const {
00064     return gsl_shift_function_dE(l,energy,totalSepE(),radius(),redmass(),
00065                                  z1(),z2());
00066   };
00067  private:
00068   int z1_;
00069   int z2_;
00070   double redmass_;
00071   double totalSepE_;
00072   double radius_;
00073 };
